scripts.preelectron-builder: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); try{fs.rmSync('build_out/win-unpacked',{recursive:true,force:true});}catch(e){console.error('[clean] failed to remove build_out/win-unpacked:', e.message); process.exit(1);}"
scripts.build:win: npm run sync:resources && npm run electron-builder -- --win --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never
scripts.build:win:offline: npm run sync:resources && npm run electron-builder -- --win nsis --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never
scripts.build:win:web: npm run sync:resources && npm run electron-builder -- --win nsis-web --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never
scripts.build:linux: npm run sync:resources && npm run electron-builder -- --linux --x64 --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never
scripts.build:mac: npm run sync:resources && npm run electron-builder -- --mac --x64 --config=electron-builder.config.js --publish=never
scripts.dist:win: npm run sync:resources && npm run build && npm run build:win
scripts.dist:win:offline: npm run sync:resources && npm run build && npm run build:win:offline
scripts.dist:win:web: npm run sync:resources && npm run build && npm run build:win:web
scripts.dist:linux: npm run sync:resources && npm run build && npm run build:linux
scripts.dist:mac: npm run sync:resources && npm run build && npm run build:mac
